Package comp3110.crossingDomain

Interface CrossingToHardwareServerInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SimulatedCrossingHardwareDomain
    public interface CrossingToHardwareServerInterface
    Defines the interface that the Crossing domain uses to communicate with a Crossing Hardware domain. It represents a set of assumptions that the Crossing domain makes about some crossing hardware domain. This interface is part of the specification of an Explicit Bridge between the Crossing Domain and some other domain that provides access to the crossing hardware.
